title:

								 - National Technical Institute for the Deaf act: hearing before the Special Subcommittee on Labor of the Committee on Education and Labor House of Representatives Eighty-ninth Congress, first session, on H.R. 7031, a bill to provide for the establishment and operation of a National Technical Institute for the Deaf, hearing held in Washington, D.C., April 27, 1965.
